entries.label: Dadra & Nagar Haveli and Daman & Diu
The Dadra And Nagar Haveli And Daman And Diu
Ministry Of Social Justice and Empowerment
Ministry Of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare
Ministry Of Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises
Ministry of Fisheries,Animal Husbandry and Dairying
Ministry Of New and Renewable Energy
Ministry of Electronics and Information Technology
Ministry of Women and Child Development
Ministry Of Skill Development And Entrepreneurship
Ministry Of Personnel, Public Grievances And Pensions
Ministry Of Petroleum and Natural Gas
Comptroller And Auditor General Of India
Ministry Of Environment,forests and climate change
Ministry Of Consumer Affairs, Food And Public Distribution
Ministry Of Development Of North Eastern Region
Ministry Of Statistics and Programme Implementation
NITI Aayog (National Institution for Transforming India)

fields.schemeName: Pradhan Mantri Matsya Sampada Yojana: Accident Insurance Scheme - Uttarakhand
fields.briefDescription: Under this scheme, fish farmers are provided insurance coverage of ₹5 lakh in case of accidental death/total permanent disability, ₹2.5 lakh for partial disability, & ₹50,000 for hospitalization. No premium is required to be paid by fish farmers, entire cost of the insurance is fully borne by Dept.

fields.schemeName: Sugarcane Development Scheme
fields.briefDescription: The "Sugarcane Development Scheme" by the Sugarcane Development and Sugar Industry, Govt of Uttarakhand, aims to support quality sugarcane cultivation. It provides subsidies to farmers for nursery development, seed/soil treatment, and sett treatment to manage pests and diseases.

fields.schemeName: Laado Protsahan Yojana
fields.briefDescription: The scheme aims to encourage the birth of girl children in poor families and promote their holistic development. Under this scheme, financial support ₹1,50,000/- is provided in seven installments to the parents or guardians of girls born in Government/authorized Medical Institutions.

fields.schemeName: Financial Assistance to Authors for Book Publication
fields.briefDescription: The scheme aims to support the state's eminent litterateurs, writers, poets, and authors by providing aid up to ₹2,00,000/- whose literary works remain unpublished due to financial constraints.

fields.schemeName: Integrated Social Security Scheme - Old Age Pension
fields.briefDescription: ISSS-OAP is a State Sponsored Scheme by the Social Welfare Dept. of the Govt. of Jammu and Kashmir wherein financial assistance is provided to Old Age Persons who have meager support or no source of livelihood. A pension of ₹1000 per pensioner per month is deposited directly into their Bank Account.

fields.schemeName: Financial Assistance to Scheduled Tribe (Plains) Students for Coaching for Getting Admission into Medical/Engineering/IIT/etc.
fields.briefDescription: The scheme aims to provide financial assistance to ST (P) students for coaching to qualify for Medical, Engineering, and IIT entrance exams. It benefits eligible students by reimbursing coaching expenses, with selection based on merit from matriculation exam scores.

fields.schemeName: Student Program Under AcSIR
fields.briefDescription: The scheme "Student Program Under AcSIR" implemented by the Academy of Scientific and Innovative Research (AcSIR), aims to promote high-quality research and leadership development in Earth Sciences through doctoral education. It provides research opportunities to geoscience postgraduate students.

fields.schemeName: Madho Singh Bhandari Cooperative Collective Farming Scheme
fields.briefDescription: The scheme aims to uplift the living standards of the cooperative society and committee members by enabling large-scale production, storage, and release of finished products. Through this scheme, integrated farming models, increased production, and livelihood opportunities are provided.

fields.schemeName: Promotion of Tribal Culture
fields.briefDescription: The scheme provides financial grants (up to ₹3,00,000/- per organization) to registered NGOs/Trusts/Voluntary Organizations for promoting tribal culture among ST(P) communities in Assam's plain districts (outside BTC).

fields.schemeName: Freeship less than ₹1,00,000 (UG students only)
fields.briefDescription: The scheme "Freeship Less than ₹1,00,000 only for UG students" by the Dean Student Welfare, GBPUAT, Pantnagar aims to support meritorious undergraduate students from low-income families. This Freeship scheme provides full tuition fee exemption to eligible students.

fields.schemeName: Manav Kalyan Yojana
fields.briefDescription: The scheme provides toolkit assistance (e-vouchers) to economically weak individuals (annual income ≤ ₹6,00,000/-) for self-employment in 10 trades like dairy, plumbing, and beauty parlors. Beneficiaries include SC/ST, nomadic tribes, and BPL families.

fields.schemeName: Yuvak Mangal Dal and Mahila Mangal Dal Self-Reliance Scheme
fields.briefDescription: Under this scheme, each group is provided financial assistance of ₹14,268/- for the purchase of essential materials for community use, with the aim of making them self-reliant.

fields.schemeName: Quality Certification Assistance Scheme
fields.briefDescription: This scheme provides financial assistance to Micro, Small, and Medium Enterprises (MSMEs) in Haryana for obtaining quality certifications such as ISO, HACCP, BSI, WHO-GMP, ZED, TS, and Hallmark. It aims to promote quality standards and enhance competitiveness among MSMEs.

fields.schemeName: Personal Interest Subsidy Scheme
fields.briefDescription: The scheme aims to support rural entrepreneurs in setting up industries using local resources. Through this scheme, interest subsidy on bank-financed projects up to ₹5,00,000 is provided.

fields.schemeName: Uttarakhand State Andolankari Pension to the Dependants (For Other State)
fields.briefDescription: "Uttarakhand State Andolankari Pension to the Dependants (For Other State)" is a social welfare scheme implemented by the Department of Home that provides a monthly pension to the dependents of the injured/jailed agitators from other states during the Uttarakhand State Movement.

fields.schemeName: Printing and Free Distribution of Sanskrit Textbooks
fields.briefDescription: The scheme aims to support sanskrit school students by providing annual textbook financial aid ranging from ₹250 to ₹700.

fields.schemeName: Mukhyamantri Nishulk Gas Refill Yojana
fields.briefDescription: "Mukhyamantri Nishulk Gas Refill Yojana" is a social welfare scheme implemented by the Department Of Food, Civil Supplies & Consumer Affairs, Government of Uttarakhand, that provides 3 free gas refills in 1 year to the Antyodaya families.

fields.schemeName: Shravan Tirthdarshan Yojna
fields.briefDescription: The scheme aims to facilitate pilgrimage travel for senior citizens of Gujarat by providing financial assistance for travel expenses. It benefits eligible senior citizens through reimbursements or direct arrangements with authorized travel agents.

fields.schemeName: Capacity Building For Service Providers - Skill Testing & Certification
fields.briefDescription: The scheme "Skill Testing & Certification" is a Suo-Moto Sub-Category of Programmes under the Umbrella Scheme of "Capacity Building for Service Providers", Ministry of Tourism. In this scheme, financial assistance is provided to conduct Skilling and Re-Skilling Programmes.

fields.schemeName: Pradhan Mantri Matsya Sampada Yojana: Refrigerated Vehicles – Haryana
fields.briefDescription: The scheme aims to enhance cold chain infrastructure & ensure hygienic and efficient fish transportation. Under this scheme, financial assistance is provided to fishers for purchasing refrigerated vehicles to maintain the freshness & quality of fish during post-harvest handling & transportation.

fields.schemeName: Jute Raw Material Bank Scheme
fields.briefDescription: Jute Raw Material Bank Scheme (JRMB) will be set up in the local clusters across the country in collaboration with bonafide Agencies who have adequate experience in similar activities and have the required storage, display, and selling infrastructure.

fields.schemeName: Infrastructure and Technology Support
fields.briefDescription: The sub-scheme “Infrastructure and Technology Support” aims to develop world-class infrastructure in the country to support handicraft production, enhance product quality, and reduce costs to enable it to compete in the global market.

fields.schemeName: Amended Technology Upgradation Fund
fields.briefDescription: The Ministry of Textiles introduced the Amended Technology Upgradation Fund Scheme (ATUFS). This scheme aims to facilitate investment, employment, productivity, quality and import and export substitution in the textile industry.

fields.schemeName: Special Incentive to OBC Meritorious Students (Boys & Girls)
fields.briefDescription: This scheme offers a financial incentive of up to ₹10,000/- to meritorious Other Backward Classes (OBC) students who have achieved 80% or higher marks in the HSSLC examination. The objective is to motivate and encourage OBC students to pursue higher education.

fields.schemeName: PMMSY: Establishment of Medium RAS / Biofloc culture system - Haryana
fields.briefDescription: The scheme provides capital assistance to fish farmers and entrepreneurs for establishing medium-scale Recirculatory Aquaculture Systems (RAS) and Biofloc systems.

fields.schemeShortTitle: DEVELOPMENT SUPPORT FOR COFFEE  WRAPPING MATERIAL FOR WHITE STEM BORER AFFECTED PLANTS
fields.schemeName: Development Support for Coffee in Traditional Areas and Non Tribal growers of Non-Traditional Area : Support for wrapping material for White Stem Borer affected plants
fields.briefDescription: To encourage the coffee growers by providing 50% subsidy on material cost so that the technology will be adopted on a massive scale which will contribute to great extent in minimizing the pest load in field and for effective management of the dreaded pest, CWSB in Arabica plantations.
tags: Support For Wrapping Material For White Stem Borer Affected Plants

fields.schemeShortTitle: SUPPORT FOR MIXED SHADE TREE SAPLINGS
fields.schemeName: Coffee Development Programme in Non-Traditional Areas (NTA) : Support for Mixed Shade Tree saplings
fields.briefDescription: To encourage planting of mixed species of native trees / fruit yielding trees like mango, jack, syzygium, orange etc, in new coffee holdings so as to establish good evergreen shade canopy to increase soil fertility, moisture retention capacity and thereby increasing productivity
tags: Support For Mixed Shade Tree Saplings

fields.schemeName: Market Development and Export Promotion : Participation in Domestic Fairs / Coffee Festivals etc. including support to Roasters & others for participation in the events
fields.briefDescription: To increase per capita consumption on one hand, and convert more consumers from occasional drinkers to regular drinkers

fields.schemeName: Coffee Development Programme in Non-Traditional Areas (NTA) : Support for Coffee Consolidation
fields.briefDescription: The main objective of consolidation is to improve the productivity of existing coffee holdings by gap filling/ rejuvenation followed with improved cultivation methods like application of compost, bush management, shade management, pest& disease control etc.

fields.schemeName: Market Development and Export Promotion : Barista Training Programme
fields.briefDescription: This programme is a significant skill development initiative aimed at empowering youth, entrepreneurs, and coffee professionals with practical knowledge and expertise in espresso-based beverage preparation, milk steaming, and latte art.

fields.schemeName: Market Development and Export Promotion : Support to Coffee Curing Units
fields.briefDescription: To enhance quality of coffee product and achieve value addition and efficiency through introduction of improved technologies in coffee processing at the curing stage

fields.schemeName: ICSSR Senior Fellowship
fields.briefDescription: The Indian Council of Social scientific Research (ICSSR), under the Ministry of Education, offers a Senior Fellowship Scheme designed to assist accomplished Indian researchers in conducting advanced social science research.

fields.schemeName: PMMSY: Inputs for fresh water Aquaculture including Composite fish culture, Scampi, Pangasius, Tilapia etc - Haryana
fields.briefDescription: The scheme under Pradhan Mantri Matsya Sampada Yojana (PMMSY) provides input cost subsidy for freshwater aquaculture in newly constructed ponds to expand fisheries production in Haryana.

fields.schemeName: PMMSY: Construction of New Grow Out Ponds - Haryana
fields.briefDescription: The scheme aims to expand fisheries in various urban and semi-urban areas through the construction of new grow-out ponds. Through this scheme, subsidies are provided for the construction of new grow-out ponds to beneficiaries who are engaged in fisheries.

fields.schemeName: PMMSY: Cycle with Ice Boxes-Haryana
fields.briefDescription: The scheme aims to provide central assistance for the cost of cycles with ice boxes for fisheries activities. Through this scheme, central assistance is provided for newly purchased cycles with ice boxes for the initial crop.

fields.schemeName: Swachh Bharat Mission (Grameen) Phase II
fields.briefDescription: A sanitation scheme for Visual cleanliness through Open Defecation Free (ODF) sustainability and effective management of solid and liquid waste in villages.

fields.schemeName: Ambedkar International Scholarship - SC
fields.briefDescription: The "Ambedkar International Scholarship - SC" Scheme by the Rajasthan Social Justice and Empowerment Department provides financial assistance to meritorious SC students for pursuing Ph.D. studies in foreign universities in Humanities and Social Sciences.

fields.schemeName: Mukhyamantri Anusuchit Jati Ewam Anusuchit Janjati Civil Sewa Protsahan Yojana
fields.briefDescription: The objective of the scheme is to provide financial assistance to SC & ST candidates who qualify in the preliminary examination of Civil Services Competitive Examination conducted by the BPSC, Patna, and the UPSC, New Delhi, to support their preparation for main examination/interview.

fields.schemeName: Bihar Startup Policy
fields.briefDescription: This is a policy for entrepreneurs to boost entrepreneurship in the state of Bihar and it was launched in July 2022 .

fields.schemeName: Mahila Udhyami Vishesh Protsahan Yojana
fields.briefDescription: Under this scheme, a capital subsidy of up to 25% of the total fixed capital investment and an interest subsidy of 6% on bank-approved loans are provided to women entrepreneurs for setting up micro and small enterprises in the manufacturing and service sectors.

fields.schemeName: Kishore Vaigyanik Protsahan Yojana
fields.briefDescription: The KVPY is a national fellowship program in basic sciences, initiated and funded by the Department of Science and Technology to attract exceptionally motivated students to pursue basic science courses and a research career in science.

fields.schemeName: Swayam Saksham Yojana (GBCDC)
fields.briefDescription: This scheme aims to instill a sense of self-reliance in the youth belonging to backward classes after receiving vocational education/training. Under this scheme, eligible youth are provided loans at a low-interest rate to start self-employment ventures.

fields.schemeName: Swayam Saksham Yojana (GTKVN)
fields.briefDescription: The scheme aims to promote economic self-reliance among professionally educated unemployed youth from Thakor & Koli communities, aged between 18 & 35 years, who hold degrees in fields such as Pharmacy, Software/Hardware, Automobile Engineering, Law, Chartered Accountancy, & others.

fields.schemeName: Training for Horticulture Skill Development for Self-Employment at Centre of Excellence
fields.briefDescription: The scheme "Training for Horticulture Skill Development for Self-Employment at Centre of Excellence " is aimed at promoting self-employment opportunities across all communities in Gujarat through practical and theoretical learning at the Centre of Excellence.

fields.schemeName: Solar Water Heating System (Domestic Sector)
fields.briefDescription: The scheme "Solar Water Heating System (Domestic Sector)" by the Renewable Energy Department, Haryana, aims to promote the use of solar energy for domestic water heating by providing a financial subsidy to the residents of Haryana and Haryana Government employees residing in Chandigarh.

fields.schemeName: National Family Benefit Scheme for BPL Families
fields.briefDescription: The scheme "National Family Benefit Scheme for BPL Families" by the Social Justice and Empowerment Department, Government of Haryana, aims to provide one-time financial assistance to economically vulnerable families after the death of the primary breadwinner.

fields.schemeName: Stamp Duty Refund
fields.briefDescription: The Government of Haryana offers reimbursement of stamp duty charges to incentivize industrial investment and infrastructure development across the state. This scheme provides financial relief on stamp duty paid during land or property registration for eligible sectors and locations.

fields.schemeName: Supply of Insulated Boxes
fields.briefDescription: A subsidy to the extent of 75% of the cost for the purchase of an insulated box of at least 50 liters capacity. Only the fisherman engaged in selling and marketing fish, fishing at sea with a canoe, and fishing at sea with a mechanized fishing vessel with upto 6-cylinder engines are eligible.

fields.schemeName: Grant of 50% Subsidy for the Purchase of Aquarium and Its Accessories under "Development of Freshwater Aquaculture and Setting up of Aquarium, Ornamental Fish Breeding Centre"
fields.briefDescription: "Grant of 50% Subsidy for the Purchase of Aquarium and Its Accessories" is introduced with the objective to propagate the importance of aquarium keeping and to inculcate the art of aquarium keeping among the general public. The scheme is extended to all the regions of Puducherry.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Social Justice and Empowerment
fields.schemeName: Vocational Education and Training Loan Scheme
fields.briefDescription: The Vocational Education and Training Loan Scheme provides financial assistance to youth of the target group to enhance their skills & employability.

fields.schemeName: Assistance to Traditional Pottery Makers
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “Assistance to Traditional Pottery Makers” provides financial assistance to Traditional Pottery makers belonging to the state OBC category for the purchase of modern machinery for job modernization.

fields.schemeName: AGR 2 (Farm Mechanization) Scheme Of Farmers Other Than SC/ST
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “AGR 2 (Farm Mechanization) Scheme of Farmers Other Than SC/ST” was started by the Department of Agriculture, Farmers Welfare & Co-operation, Government of Gujarat.

fields.schemeName: SERB International Research Experience
fields.briefDescription: The Science and Engineering Research Board (SERB), a statutory body under the Department of Science and Technology, Government of India has launched "SERB International Research Experience (SIRE)".

fields.schemeName: Financial Assistance for Purchase of Stake Net and its Accessories
fields.briefDescription: “Financial Assistance for Purchase of Stake Net and its Accessories” is a scheme by the Dept. of Fisheries, Govt. of Goa. Under this scheme, financial assistance is provided in the form of a subsidy on the purchase of stake nets and accessories for the fishermen.

fields.schemeName: Asangathit Karmakar Prasuti Sahayata Yojana
fields.briefDescription: Chhattisgarh State Government started a scheme "Asangathit Karmakar Prasuti Sahayata Yojana" for unorganized worker on 10 April 2018.

fields.schemeName: Subsidy Scheme For Establishment Of Goat Unit (10+1) For Scheduled Caste People
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “Subsidy Scheme for Establishment of Goat Unit (10+1) for Scheduled Caste People” was launched by the Dept. of Agriculture, Farmers Welfare & Co-operation, Government of Gujarat to uplift economically poor livestock breeders of Gujarat State.

fields.schemeName: Coffee Development Programme in North Eastern Region: Expansion of Coffee
fields.briefDescription: The scheme "Coffee Development Programme in North Eastern Region: Expansion of Coffee" by the Coffee Board, Department of Commerce, Ministry of Commerce and Industry, aims to facilitate afforestation in the Jhum lands and help settle the tribals on a permanent footing.

fields.schemeName: Relief and Rehabilitation Assistance to Sri Lankan Refugees in the Refugee Camps
fields.briefDescription: The scheme provides relief materials, which among other things include Feeding Charges, Subsidized Rice, Clothing Materials, Utensils, Transportation Charges (on arrival), Porterage and Transport (on repatriation), Cash Doles, Infrastructure Facilities (at camps), Electricity, Drinking Water, etc.

fields.schemeName: Self Employment Scheme - Goa
fields.briefDescription: "Self Employment Scheme" provides financial support up to a maximum of ₹ 10,00,000 to any individual person belonging to Scheduled Tribes Community to undertake any self-employment activities.

fields.schemeName: Grant of Subsidy for Procurement of Vehicle
fields.briefDescription: "Grant of Subsidy for Procurement of Vehicle" aims to facilitate the quick transportation of fish catches from landing centers to marketing places, thereby preventing/minimizing spoilage of fish. It provides a 50% subsidy for the procurement of specified vehicles.

fields.schemeName: Samajik Mukti
fields.briefDescription: The government issued 'Samajik Mukti' (Social Freedom) cards to unorganised sector workers of the State for Provident Fund & Other Social Benefit scheme.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Personnel, Public Grievances And Pensions
fields.schemeName: Central Vigilance Commission (CVC) Internship Scheme
fields.briefDescription: CVC initiated an Internship Scheme in the year 2016. This Scheme seeks to engage Indian Nationals, who are Graduates (awaiting final year results) /Post Graduate or Research Students enrolled in reputed Universities/Institutions in India or abroad.

fields.schemeName: Integrated Child Development Services: Chandigarh
fields.briefDescription: The Integrated Child Development Service (ICDS) Scheme providing for supplementary nutrition, immunization and pre-school education to the children is a popular flagship programme of the government. Launched in 1975, it is one of the world’s largest programmes providing for an integrated package of

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Social Justice and Empowerment
fields.schemeName: Samarth-Respite Care Scheme
fields.briefDescription: Samarth (Respite Care) scheme, launched by the Department of Empowerment of Persons with Disabilities, aims at setting up Samarth Centres for providing respite and residential care for the specified categories of Persons with Disability (PwD).

fields.schemeName: Asangathit Karmakar Ke Bachcho Hetu Chhatravriti Yojana
fields.briefDescription: Chhattisgarh state Government started a scheme "Asangathit Karmakar Ke Bachcho Hetu Chhatravriti Yojana" for unorganized worker on 10 April 2018

fields.schemeName: Madilu Kit
fields.briefDescription:
The Madilu Programme is a government initiative focused on empowering rural communities through skill development and entrepreneurship opportunities.
It aims to create sustainable livelihoods, reduce poverty, and enhance social and economic well-being in rural areas.

fields.schemeName: Award of Pre-matric Scholarship to Scheduled Caste Students Studying from VI to X Standard in Government Schools and Government recognised Private Schools in the Union Territory of Puducherry
fields.briefDescription: The objective of the scheme is to provide financial assistance to Scheduled Caste students to complete their education up to the secondary level and to avoid dropping out of the Scheduled Caste students from their education.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of New and Renewable Energy
fields.schemeName: Pradhan Mantri Kisan Urja Suraksha Evam Utthan Mahabhiyan Scheme For Farmers.
fields.briefDescription: Pradhan Mantri Kisan Urja Surakshaevam Utthaan Mahabhiyan Yojana (PM-KUSUM Scheme) was launched in March 2019 by the Ministry of New and Renewable Energy (MNRE), to subsidize farmers to install solar irrigation pumps for cultivation. Each farmer will receive a 60% subsidy.

fields.schemeName: Tripura Journalist Health Insurance Scheme
fields.briefDescription: A Health Insurance Scheme by the Directorate of Information & Culture Affairs, for Journalists who are permanent residents of the state of Tripura. The applicant must be an accredited journalist by the state government or PIB. The age must be in between 21-65 years.

fields.schemeName: Scheme of Pension for Eminent Sports Persons
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “Scheme of Pension for Eminent Sports Persons” was launched by the Department of Sports, Government of Punjab to provide pension to eminent veteran sportsmen who have excelled at International level during their youth and made the nation proud.

fields.schemeName: Vocational Training For VJNT And SBC Candidates Studying In Government Industrial Training Institute
fields.briefDescription: The State Government of Maharashtra has introduced in 2003-04 the scheme to create self-employment for unemployed youths and students of VJNT and SBC who apply for a Vocational Training.

fields.schemeName: Startup India Seed Fund Scheme- For Incubators
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “Startup India Seed Fund Scheme (SISFS)” was launched by the DPIIT on 19th April 2021 to provide financial assistance to startups for proof of concept, prototype development, product trials, market-entry, and commercialization.

fields.schemeName: Shop Construction/Shop Operation Scheme For Rehabilitation Of PwDs
fields.briefDescription: The "Shop Construction/Shop Operation Scheme For Rehabilitation Of PwDs" Scheme has been started by the Government of Uttar Pradesh and operated by the Department of Empowerment of Persons with Disabilities, Uttar Pradesh.

fields.schemeName: AICTE-PROFESSIONAL DEVELOPMENT SCHEME
fields.briefDescription: AICTE-Professional Development Scheme enables meritorious faculty to interact at International Level Conferences, both within and outside India, Seminars, and Symposia.

fields.schemeName: Internship Policy Of Indian Council For Cultural Relations (ICCR)
fields.briefDescription: ICCR provides an excellent opportunity for budding scholars to familiarise themselves with the role of soft power in foreign policy formulation in the Govt of India. These ‘Interns’ would be expected to supplement the process of analysis in various fields (creative writing, cultural mapping, etc).

fields.schemeName: Safai Karmakaar Putr/Putri Cycle sahayata yojana
fields.briefDescription: Chhattisgarh State Government started a scheme "Safai Karmakaar Putr/Putree Cycle Sahayata Yojana" for unorganized worker on 27 August 2015.

fields.schemeName: National Post Doctoral Fellowship
fields.briefDescription: The “National Post Doctoral Fellowship (N-PDF)” was launched by the Science and Engineering Research Board, Government of India to identify motivated young researchers and provide them support for doing research in frontier areas of science and engineering.

fields.schemeName: Rajiv Gandhi Kisan Nyay Yojana
fields.briefDescription: Rajiv Gandhi Kisan Nyay Yojana is a scheme of the Government of Chhattisgarh for the farmers. This scheme was launched on 21 May 2020, on the death anniversary of Rajiv Gandhi.

fields.schemeName: Market Support Scheme for Smaller Business Units
fields.briefDescription: The objective of the "Market Support Scheme for Smaller Business Units" is to provide Market Support to the eligible IT Units in Goa. A reimbursement of 50% of the exhibition rental cost will be provided for participating in national/ international exhibitions, limited to 9 square meter of space.

fields.schemeName: Financial Help On Death Of Family Head
fields.briefDescription: Financial help on death of family head scheme was launched by Rajasthan state government under tribal area development on 20/08/2008. Under this scheme, ₹10,000/- to the wife of the deceased on the premature death of the head of the family of Saharia primitive tribe.

fields.schemeName: Chief Ministergi Artistesinggi Tengbang (CMAT) – Artiste’s Pension
fields.briefDescription: The scheme "Chief Ministergi Artistesinggi Tengbang (CMAT) – Artiste’s Pension" by the Dept. of Art and Culture, Govt. of Manipur provides a monthly pension of up to ₹ 4,000/- to the aged reputed artists who have contributed to making the tradition, culture, and art forms of Manipur more vibrant.

fields.schemeName: NPC Students Internship Program
fields.briefDescription: National Productivity Council (NPC) provides internship training to students pursuing graduation and post-graduation. The interns shall be given exposure to related interventions being activities undertaken by NPC which will provide opportunities to learn and implement new concepts.

fields.schemeName: Grant In Aid To Old Age Home
fields.briefDescription: The "Grant in Aid to Old Age Home" is a scheme by the Dept. of Social Justice & Special Assistance, Govt. of Maharashtra. In this scheme, grants are provided to the NGOs for accommodating old men & women, destitute, disabled victims, into Old Age Homes, and providing them with food, & accommodation.

fields.schemeName: Tagore National Scholarship for Cultural Research
fields.briefDescription: The Scheme has been introduced to invigorate and revitalize the various institutions under the Ministry of Culture and other identified cultural institutions in the country, by encouraging Scholars/academicians to affiliate themselves with these institutions to work on projects of mutual interest.

fields.schemeName: Chief Minister Career Advancement in Biotechnology
fields.briefDescription: The programme “Chief Minister’s Career Advancement in Biotechnology (CM-CAB)” aims at providing opportunities to Young Faculty and Scientists in Biotechnology to have national and/or international collaborative research training and exposure to advanced techniques and technologies in biotechnology.

fields.schemeName: Internship Programme Of The Department Of Expenditure
fields.briefDescription: The Internship Programme of the Department of Expenditure aims to familiarize willing and eligible undergraduates pursuing five-year integrated courses and Graduates pursuing post-Graduation/ post-Graduates pursuing Research with the overall process of formulation of economic policies of the Govt.

fields.schemeName: Promotion of Energy Audit and Conservation of Energy (PEACE): Awareness Programme
fields.briefDescription: The "Awareness Programme" component of the PEACE scheme is introduced to make the MSMEs understand that the energy audit and conserving energy is a critical issue that is of great importance to the financial performance and competitiveness of their enterprise.

fields.schemeName: Pandit Deendayal Upadhyay National Welfare Fund For Sportspersons
fields.briefDescription: The scheme of PDUNWFS is being implemented with the objective of providing financial assistance to outstanding sportspersons/family members living in indigent circumstances for various purposes like ameliorate condition, medical treatment, injuries, procurement of sports equipment etc.

fields.schemeName: Financial Assistance to Revive, Preserve and Protect Goan Maand Culture
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “Financial Assistance to Revive, Preserve and Protect Goan Maand Culture” by the Directorate of Art and Culture, Government of Goa has been designed with the objective of encouraging Goan Folk artists to revive, preserve and protect the Goan Maand culture consisting of folk forms.

fields.schemeName: Star College Scheme For Strengthening Of Science Education And Training At Undergraduate Level
fields.briefDescription: The Dept. of Biotechnology has launched "Star College Scheme for Strengthening of Science Education and Training at Undergraduate Level" for improving critical thinking and 'hands-on' experimental work at the undergraduate (college) level in sciences.

fields.schemeName: KSCSTE Post-Doctoral Fellowship Programme
fields.briefDescription: KSCSTE Post-Doctoral Fellowships will be provided to those who possess Ph.D. in science and engineering with high quality research publications in SCI journals. The program aims to encourage Ph.D. holders to pursue further research and to develop career as scientist.

fields.schemeName: Mukhyamantri Noni Babu Medhavi Shiksha Sahayata Yojana
fields.briefDescription: Chhattisgarh State Government started a scheme "Mukhyamantri Noni Babu Medhavi Shiksha Sahayata Yojana" for Building and other construction worker on 06 January 2012.

fields.schemeName: Maulana Azad National Fellowship For Minority Students
fields.briefDescription: Maulana Azad National Fellowship For Minority Students was launched in 2009 by the Ministry of Minority Affairs for providing financial aid to students for their higher studies.

fields.schemeName: SITARE-Gandhian Young Technological Innovation Award Grant
fields.briefDescription: Under SITARE-GYTI scheme component, 15 innovative student projects will receive funding support of upto INR 15 lakhs each. The scheme encourages postgraduate & doctoral students to undertake projects with commercial potential leading to the creation of biotech startups.

fields.schemeName: Performance Linked Grant Scheme for Smaller Business Units
fields.briefDescription: The objective of the "Performance Linked Grant Scheme for Smaller Business Units" is to provide a Performance Linked Grant of 5% of the reported net income to the eligible Information Technology Units in the State of Goa, subject to a total cap of ₹ 25,00,000.

fields.schemeName: Financial Incentives To Mothers Who Deliver A Girl Child (Mamta)
fields.briefDescription: The objective of the Mamta Scheme is aimed at improving the Female Child Sex Ratio in the State. The scheme is open to all mothers who deliver a live Girl Child (max. 02 deliveries) in a registered medical institution. The scheme shall be implemented through the ICDS.

fields.schemeName: Coffee Development Programme in North Eastern Region: Consolidation of Coffee
fields.briefDescription: The scheme "Consolidation of Coffee" aims to increase the productivity of the existing coffee holdings by gap filling or rejuvenation, followed by improved cultivation methods such as application of compost, bush management, shade management, pest and disease control, etc.

fields.schemeName: Nationwide Artificial Insemination Programme
fields.briefDescription: The Nationwide Artificial Insemination Programme (NAIP), is a flagship program of the Department of Animal Husbandry and Dairying. The objective of the programme is to increase the productivity of livestock by improving the genetic potential through artificial insemination.

fields.nodalMinistryName: Ministry Of Social Justice and Empowerment
fields.schemeName: Loan Based Schemes For Safai Karamchari - Sanitary Marts Scheme
fields.briefDescription: A  contributory Loan scheme by Ministry of Social justice and Empowerment for individual beneficiaries/self help groups of Liberated Safai Karamchari, Manual Scavengers and their dependants aged 18 years and above, for setting up A Sanitary Marts (SM) is a one-stop-shop for all things for sanitation

fields.schemeName: Advance For Purchase Or Construction Of House (APB&OCWWB)
fields.briefDescription: The scheme “Advance for Purchase or Construction of House” was started by the Department of Labour and Employment, Govt. of Arunachal Pradesh for the registered workers of Arunachal Pradesh Building & Other Construction Workers Welfare Board (APB&OCWWB).
